comment: A useful equivalence related to substitution. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.) It seems proving ~ wl-equsald first, and then deriving more specialized versions ~ wl-equsal and ~ wl-equsal1t then is more efficient than the other way round, which is possible, too. See also ~ equsal . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 27-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
